.@SecretaryCarson:Whatever a person’s story may be, our goal is to help them stand on their own, in whatever way they need support. #NAEH17
.@SecretaryCarson: We must ensure that roof has a strong foundation to weather future storms. #NAEH17
.@SecretaryCarson: We can’t put a person under a roof and declare our job finished. #NAEH17
.@SecretaryCarson: People can’t beat addiction from a gutter, or get psychiatric help under a bridge. #NAEH17
.@SecretaryCarson: Poverty, homelessness, addiction truly become tragedies if perceived 'normal' when they're “just way things are" #NAEH17
.@SecretaryCarson: It’s a tragedy that a nation as prosperous as ours should see anyone forced to sleep on its streets. #NAEH17
